Lists Amanda Walsh as Katie in the full credits and while it also lists other members of the full cast not seen in this episode, i look to Ep1 and Amanda aka Katie is not listed at all...
http://uk.imdb.com/title/tt1091289/fullcredits#cast

Added to that, it says "A pair of brilliant theoretical physicists meet a woman who shows them how little they know about the real world. ", which is the theme of this episode.

The subtitles are here... (Or search elsewhere)

Which lists "Pilot" episode before The Big Bran Hypothesis" which is the first episode with Penny etc, so the pilot is this show.

So those pilot subs shown there as pilot are in fact the ones relevant to this episode.
